Name: Astral Cube
About the game: Welcome to Astral Cube. This is a 2.5D platformer experience where the rules are simple, move & avoid obstacles. Each stage have a start point and a finish point and with each stage you pass the next one becomes harder and harder. You will encounter traps with very complex behaviors where in order to avoid them you have to think smart. Key Features Goal: Avoid dangerous obstacles & survive. Gameplay: Learn to be precise, control your acceleration and rotation. Environment: You are alone in space, traveling through the unforgiving & silent environment.
